casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Montrez Demario CARTER. No. 290A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. George E. Kelly, III, Palmyra, VA, for Montrez Demario Carter.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 1st day of June 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
